entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late in the evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
